It wasn't complete yet, so it was replaced with UNIVERSAL SUBSERVIENCE. permalink parent award report block reply MarshallB 1 points 2 hours ago Key Points Secession is NOT Insurrection. The Constitution was silent about secession. The Constitution mentioned in both Amendments 9 & 10 that there were other rights and those were reserved to the States or to the People.
